values.name: other
values.description: Other reason not covered by the enumerated values.

values.name: invalid-apdu-in-this-state
values.description: Invalid APDU received in the current state.

values.name: preempted-by-higher-priority-task
values.description: Operation was preempted by a higher priority task.

values.name: segmentation-not-supported
values.description: Segmentation is not supported by the device.

values.name: insufficient-security
values.description: Insufficient security level for the requested operation.

values.name: window-size-out-of-range
values.description: Window size is out of the acceptable range.

values.name: application-exceeded-reply-time
values.description: Application exceeded the allowed reply time.

values.name: out-of-resources
values.description: Out of resources to complete the operation.

values.name: apdu-too-long
values.description: APDU is too long to process.
